assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Ardentec Corporation provides semiconductor testing solutions in memory, logic, and mixed-signal ICs (integrated circuits) to integrated device manufacturers, pure play wafer foundry companies, and fabless design companies. The company offers testing services comprising engineering services before mass production, such as test engineering consultations and recommendations for design, test plan and test program development, test program cross-platform conversion, remote tester usage, complete product characterization, and laser program development and analysis; and mass production engineering services consisting of suggestions and services of test time reduction, yield analysis and enhancement, laser repair yield analysis and improvement, timely retrieval of test data on secured Internet, test program management system, traceable test program management system, test data analysis and periodical report provision, and outlier management services, as well as stable testing services. It also provides probe card design and consultant, outsourced manufacturing, and maintenance and system management for repair record and tracking services; wafer level chip scale packaging backend process services; and wafer probing platforms. In addition, the company offers certification, quality engineering analysis services, and quality system and assurance structure services, as well as quality, information security, and hazardous substance free policy services; and security policy, IT service architecture, and testing information services. It operates in the United States, Taiwan, Singapore, Korea, China, and internationally. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.
